items.sentence: Tom and Mary ate lunch at the mall food court.
Tom had never used the washing machine before.
Tom speaks French almost as well as Mary does.
Tom doesn't expect anything from life anymore.
I'll try to buy one of those as soon as I can.
Tom did what he did because Mary asked him to.
Would you have time to help me this afternoon?
When are you coming? We really need your help.
Old soldiers never die. They simply fade away.
There are always a lot of cars on this street.
